com.wikiaudioapp.wikiaudio.activates.mediaplayer

Class MediaPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wikiaudioapp.wikiaudio.activates.mediaplayer.MediaPlayer

  • public class MediaPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The manager of what is being played and when to (use MediaPlayerFragment to) display it
